SEARCH
Package sh.brane.core.error

Class KzgException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
java.lang.RuntimeException
sh.brane.core.error.BraneException
sh.brane.core.error.KzgException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class KzgException extends BraneException
Exception for KZG commitment failures.

KZG (Kate-Zaverucha-Goldberg) commitments are used in EIP-4844 blob transactions for data availability sampling.

Since:
0.2.0
See Also:
